name: Coffee-Shop | Coding Project
data: An e-commerce responsive website where customers can order and pay by cash or scan a QR code and can sign in to the website via Line using LINE Front-end  Framework ,Creating website using typescript and using framework with react.js and design with tailwind.css and do responsive website

name: Pokemon  | Coding Project
data: This project is about displaying information about various characters in Pokemon and importing data from API. Create a website using typescript and a framework with react.js and design and do a responsive website with SCSS and tailwind.css. Using state management as zustand and Fetching Data from API with Axios.

name: Tic-tac-Toe | Coding Project
data: Tic-Tac-Toe-web-application Tables can be specified within the range of 3X3 to 10X10 and can be played by 1 to 2 players. Create a dynamic game with javascript and using react.js as framwork.  Design and responsive with Css3 and Tailwind.css.

name: CRUD | Coding Project
data: (create, Read, Update, Delete)  used programming language is TypeScript  and a framework with react.js and design and do a responsive website with tailwind.css  and Fetching Data from API with Axios.

name: Airbnb Clone | Coding Project
data: The Airbnb Clone project is a desktop website development project to prove myself cancreate a website that mimics and design of the Airbnb website Creating interface layout with HTML5 and decorating the user interface with CSS3
